utterance.speaker: Lisa Kudrow
utterance.content: Previously on Friends

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There’s this woman, that I like. A lot. Well, it’s complicated. She’s with this other guy. For a long time. And I could never do that to the guy, y’know? ’Ccause we’re really good friends.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, uh, this guy, she used to go out with, is, uh… is he a good guy?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, he’s the best.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Then talk to him! He might be fine with it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, I don’t know.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey, it’s worth finding out. I mean, if you really like her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I do! So much! I can’t stop thinking about her! I can’t sleep, I—

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, Joey, you know what? You have to go for it. How often does this happen to you, huh? You owe it to yourself.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It’s Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you um—I’m sorry, did you just say it’s Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Um, you…you like Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes. I like Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, okay but look, buy uh—Hey-hey, y’know, y’know who else I like? You! And it-it doesn’t get said enough. I like you Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But R-R-Rachel-Rachel?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, but it’s not a big deal.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s not a big deal? Oh, I’m sorry I just…um, I…what about all the stuff you-you just said? I mean how about, I like—you-you can’t stop thinking about her. Like how you can’t sleep?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m an actor, y’know? As-as a group, we tend to be over dramatic.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rachel who’s carrying my baby? Rachel?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look no, I-I know it’s bad, and I know it’s wrong. Okay? But-but it’s not like anything’s ever gonna happen. Y’know? These-these are just feelings, they’re gonna go away.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y’know what? I-I gotta go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh come on Ross! Hey Ross-Ross don’t…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I just—y’know—I-I just have one—Rachel?!

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Rachel?!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh-oh! Okay, she’s kicking!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh! She’s growing inside you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whoa!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow that was a big one.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think that’s the youngest girl ever to reject me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey you guys!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey listen let me ask you, do you believe in soul mates?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh yes I do. I do. I believe that there is one perfect person out there for everyone. And do you know how you find him? You stop looking for him. That’s why I stopped looking for Russell Crowe. He’ll find me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh-huh, and you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. I mean I believe that uh, certain people are more suited for each other and I believe in falling in love, but soul mates, I don’t think they exist.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, good.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well last night, I met Monica’s.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I had a date with this guy, and I swear to God, he is her other half.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Come on, don’t be crazy. You don’t think there’s someone out there better suited for Monica than me, do ya?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, what’s he like?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well he’s tall.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh-huh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He has brown hair.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Of course, of course.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: A tall guy with hair similar to mine, oh unknowable universe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He works with food!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh sure. Older?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Obviously, and he’s British.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I was just gonna ask!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah? And, he’s-he’s so centered and mature and confident.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, it’s so sad they never had a chance to meet.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Luckily, the guy she settled for can’t hear what you’re talking about.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I’m so sorry. Um, and maybe I’m wrong! I but—y’know I’m gonna go out with him again, I’ll find out more.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You believe that this guy is destined for someone else and you’re still gonna date him?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, he may not be my soul mate, but a girl’s gotta eat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just talked to Joey, I just—I want to see how you were.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh y’know, I still—I can’t believe it. Joey and Rachel I mean it’s… It’s like you and me going out, only weirder!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, I know you’re hurting, and-and I want to be supportive, but don’t say that again.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God! What if, what if they get married? Then he’d be the stepfather of my child.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, I don’t think that’s something we need to worry about! First of all he’s-he’s never gonna tell her how he feels about her. And even if he did you have no idea how she’d react.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure, because women never like Joey. Y’know, I think he’s a virgin.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey…he’s not even thinking about going after Rachel!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: He’s not?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No! All he’s thinking about is how you’re taking this! I mean, listen it’s totally freaking him out. He’s talking about moving to Vermont.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He says he wants to leave the country. He thinks you hate him.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hate him? I… No, I don’t hate him. It’s just it’s Rachel, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey I can’t even imagine how hard this must be for you. But, I don’t want you to lose Joey over it. And right now he just needs to know that you’re still his friend.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, I’ll talk to him.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right. Now do it soon, he just asked me how to convert his dollars into Vermont money.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Umm, Chandler, Monica, this is Don.

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: Oh, hello. Hello.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Soul mate.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Soul mate.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So, what have you guys been doing?

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: Well, we just had a terrible lunch today at Reattica. What is with all the sun-dried tomatoes at that place?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! What is this, 1985?!

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: That’s exactly what I said. Phoebe, isn’t that strange.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Not really.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What’s wrong with sun-dried tomatoes? On a barbecue chicken pizza? No?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So Don, what-what other restaurants do you like?

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: Well, Octavio, 277—Oh! And there’s this great little place, Alessandro’s.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! That’s my restaurant, I’m the chef there.

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: You’re kidding me!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: Your food is fantastic! Wow, I really want to talk to you about your menu, once I get some coffees first. Um, anyone want any?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I’d like a latte. Oh y’know what? If you’re gonna talk about me, I’m gonna go with you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What are you doing?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nothing! I swear to God I didn’t know you guys would be here! And the good news is you didn’t believe in soul mates. So…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I believe in tall, handsome strangers who hit on my wife!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: They’re just talking, and y’know what? Just because I think they’re soul mates doesn’t mean anything’s gonna happen.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, good work.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! Oh he’s great, I love him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don’t worry, we’ll find you someone else.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I understand if you came by to hit me, I deserve it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I don’t want to hit you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh what then? Kick me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Bite me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no I don’t want to do anything to you. All right? I just want to tell you that I’m not mad at you and…and that I certainly do not hate you. I just, I just came here to say that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh now—Hey Ross-Ross! Do you wanna-wanna come in for a beer or something?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh…yeah sure.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Do uh, do you got any beer? All-all I got is this melon stuff that Rachel left. I don’t…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey look Ross, you need to understand something okay? I uh…I am never gonna act on this Rachel thing, okay? I-I would never do anything to jeopardize my friendship with you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Anyway, it uh…look it’ll just…take me a while to get over her, that’s all. I’m not even sure how to do that, I mean I’ve never been in love before so…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?! You’re in love with her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I thought you knew that.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm, no.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow. Hey look, if it helps, I don’t want to feel this way. Honest. I just keep thinking, "Ah, I’ll get over this." Y’know? I just—It just keeps gettin’ harder. I don’t, I don’t know what to do. Y’know? What do I do?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think you need to tell her how you feel.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay that’s the green stuff talkin’.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I’m serious. You-you need to find out where she is, because if she’s not where you are, then you can start to move past this.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But what if uh—and I’m not saying she will be—But…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: If she is where you are then uh…then my feeling weird about it shouldn’t stand in the way.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Look if-if she’s gonna end up with somebody else, the truth is she couldn’t find a better guy. So…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey thanks.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So when do you think you’re gonna talk to her?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh my God I have to tell her! I haven’t even thought about what I will say. What should I say?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m understanding, but let’s not get carried away.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m sorry, you’re right. What am I gonna say? Oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, tell me about it.

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: …so I’ve been slowly phasing out the wine importing and focusing more on the cheese side of things.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Cheese you say? That’s some pretty smelly work, huh Don?

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Cheese, it’s smelly. You must smell a lot of the time too.

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: Uh, not really. But when it comes to cheese, I’m one of the people who thinks the smellier the better.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Me too! Yeah, Chandler can’t stand it. He won’t even allow me to have blue cheese in the house.

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: And you’re still married to him?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know what I’d love to do? I would like to go to France and eat nothing but bread and cheese—Not even bread, just cheese. No, I want the bread. Yeah. Ah, and pastries… And pate. Oh, I’m really not high, it’s just I used to be fat.

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: Well if you where ever enter the Loire valley let me know, I’ve got a great little villa you can stay at.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is it made of cheese?

utterance.speaker: Don
utterance.content: No. But God, a house made of cheese, wouldn’t that be incredible?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’d move in tomorrow!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh come on! Are you listening to this?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I’m so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What do we do?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know, they both want to live in a house of cheese! I don’t know how you fight that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. Okay, I can do this. I can tell her how I feel. Just uh, just stand up straight. Take a couple deep breaths. Look confident.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey? What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I uh, I just came by because I-I want to talk to you about something.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay what’s up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Here? In the hall? What are we animals?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well honey, I’m late for a meeting. So can you just make it quick?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay umm, I just came by to tell you that I…want to have dinner with you tonight. That’s all.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Sure! That sounds great! Just leave me a message and tell me where to meet you. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. That’s good. Okay, that give you a couple hours to prepare what you’re gonna say. Good. Yeah. Don’t you people ever knock?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’d like to have Don and Phoebe over. Wouldn’t that be nice?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure, why don’t you set it up. I’ll just be over here, browsing through the personals.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you okay? You’ve been acting weird all afternoon.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, fine. Fine. Not perfect!! But good enough.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Jeez! What is with you?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m sorry, did you say cheese?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right, what’s going on?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe thinks you and Don are soul mates, and I don’t believe in that kind of stuff. But then you two totally get along. So look, I won’t stand in your way if you want to run off with Don and live in a house of cheese.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, you don’t believe in soul mates?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No. But I’m sure ‘tomatoes’ does.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I don’t believe in soul mates either.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You don’t?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No. I don’t think that you and I were destined to end up together. I think that we fell in love and work hard at our relationship. Some days we work really hard.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So you…you don’t want to live with Don in a cheese house?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, I’ve had second thoughts about that. Do you realize how hard that would be to clean?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I love you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know what? I am going to take you out to dinner tonight. I found this place that makes the greatest mozzarella sticks and jalepino poppers . No? Really? They taste so good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: …and I know Chandler is kidding but it happens every time he touches my stomach. I mean I’m really worried the baby’s not going to like him. Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What? Yeah! Sure! Uh, look at the uh, the reason…—Is it hot in here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No. Not-not for me, but why don’t you take off your sweater?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I would, but this is a nice place and my T-shirt has a picture of Calvin doing Hobbs.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Really?! Can I see it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh. Wow, I wouldn’t think Hobbs would like that so much.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh… How long have we known each other?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Um, seven…e-e-eight, eight years. Wow.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh-huh, long time.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But over the past few weeks…

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: Hah, sorry about the wait, but it is mega-jammed in here! We have a couple specials tonight…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Actually uh, could you give us a second?

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: Sure. Sure. Second’s up! Not…that kind of table.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So you were saying?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m not quite sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, well you had asked me how long we had known each other, and I said, "Eight years." And the um, waiter came over and cut his tip in half, and umm…now here we are.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, here we are. Uhh… I… I think I’m…falling in love with you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m falling in love with you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who are you talking too? Oh, you’re kidding! Oh, it’s a joke! It’s funny. It’s funny. I don’t get it. Oh. Okay. Umm… I-I…uh, wow. Are you uh… How did umm… When?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Does it really matter?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! Wow. Wow. Wow, it is hot in here.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay look Rach, I know this is a lot. You don’t have to say anything. You-you uh, you take as much time as you need. Okay, you gotta say something!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, Joey I love you so much, but I…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah right. That’s okay. That’s fine. That’s uh, pretty much what I was expecting. So uh, it’s no big deal. All right? I think I’m gonna go.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No! Joey please! Please don’t! Please don’t leave like this! Now come on, you cannot do this to a pregnant woman!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don’t start doing that. You can’t do that Rach, ‘cause then you’re gonna make me do that. Oh, here we go!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Can I?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Joey honey I don’t…I don’t want to lose…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey-hey, hey! You can’t. Okay? Ever!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no-no Rach, please, don’t be sorry. Okay? Don’t be sorry. Y’know I was only kidding you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, that was a real good one.

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: I know! I haven’t even read them the specials yet!

utterance.speaker: Waiter
utterance.content: I don’t know. I think maybe one of them is dying. I kinda hope it’s the girl. The guy is really cute!
